name: Empire of Empires
description:
Have you ever thought about what it's like to defend your territories from enemies?

Start building your own empire right now. As the King of the Castle, you will be respected among the shores, using towers and barrack to keep others in fear.
By expanding your territory, you will gain a reputation and you will have every chance to become a true king just like Arthur. Put your tactics in motion and be ready for enemies from everywhere! Your mission is to expand your empire as much as possible and to resist as much as possible!

Game features :
- Upgrades, coins & much more upgradable items
- Expand your empire limits
- Day/night system & fast time
